title: JS BeerScript
details:
Details
-------

[https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/e/5/7/600\_453183671.jpeg](https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/e/5/7/600_453183671.jpeg)

We're BACK! Your Favourite Event (maybe, I dunno, I'm partial to it)

Alcohol + Code = LOVE!

BeerScript is our lightest event where like minds get together, have a pint, and talk javascript/coding. Feel free to bring your laptop, but there is no specific programming/talk portion to the event.

We'll be at the Watson's for the last Wednesday of the month! Come talk JavaScript, Development, and Alcohol!
